q: SELECT n/items[at0024]/value/value as name, n/items[at0001]/value/magnitude as magnitude, n/items[at0001]/value/units as units, n/items[at0006]/value/value as time FROM EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS CLUSTER n[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.laboratory_test_analyte.v1] where e/ehr_id/value = $ehr_id and n/items[at0024]/value/value = $analyte order by n/items[at0006]/value/value desc
